sqlMap.select:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectIndustryListForSelection */
SELECT A.INDUSTRY_CD , A.DIVIDE_CD , A.NAME FROM HETB_CK_INDUSTRY A WHERE A.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY A.DIVIDE_CD ASC, A.INDUSTRY_CD ASC

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectIndustry */
SELECT A.INDUSTRY_CD , A.DIVIDE_CD , A.NAME , A.USE_YN , CASE A.USE_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN '' WHEN 'N' THEN '' END USE_YN_NAME , A.INSERT_DT , A.UPDATE_DT FROM HETB_CK_INDUSTRY A WHERE INDUSTRY_CD = $industry_cd$
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectIndustryCd */ SELECT ISNULL(MAX(INDUSTRY_CD), 0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_INDUSTRY
sqlMap.insert: /* FreecheckAdminDAO.insertIndustry */ INSERT INTO HETB_CK_INDUSTRY ( INDUSTRY_CD , DIVIDE_CD , NAME , USE_YN , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_ID , INSERT_DT , UPDATE_DT , YEAR_CD , STATUS ) VALUES ( $industry_cd$ , '$divide_cd$' , '$name$' , '$use_yn$' , '$insert_id$' , '$insert_id$' , GETDATE() , GETDATE() , '$year_cd$' , 'N' )
sqlMap.update:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.updateIndustry */
UPDATE HETB_CK_INDUSTRY SET DIVIDE_CD = '$divide_cd$' , NAME = '$name$' , USE_YN = '$use_yn$' , UPDATE_ID = '$update_id$' , UPDATE_DT = GETDATE() , YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' WHERE INDUSTRY_CD = $industry_cd$

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.deleteIndustry */
UPDATE HETB_CK_INDUSTRY SET UPDATE_DT = GETDATE() , STATUS = 'Y' WHERE INDUSTRY_CD = $industry_cd$
sqlMap.select:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCompanyListTotCnt */
SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*), 1) FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY A , HETB_CK_INDUSTRY B WHERE A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.INDUSTRY_CD = B.INDUSTRY_CD AND A.YEAR_CD = #year_cd#
AND A.INDUSTRY_CD = $industry_cd$
A.TYPE_CD_01_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_02_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_03_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_04_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_05_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_06_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_07_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_08_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_09_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_10_YN LIKE 'Y'
A.TYPE_CD_11_YN LIKE 'Y'
AND A.COMPANY LIKE '%$company$%'
AND A.CEO_NAME LIKE '%$ceo_name$%'
AND A.ID LIKE '%$id$%'
AND A.GRADE_CD LIKE '$grade_cd$'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCompanyList */
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ALL_LIST.COMPANY_CD DESC) RNUM , ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT A.COMPANY_CD , A.ID , A.PASSWD , A.COMPANY , A.SA_NO , A.CEO_NAME , A.JUMIN , A.PHARMACIST_NO , A.TEL , A.FAX , A.HP , A.POST , A.ADDR1 , A.ADDR2 , A.EMAIL , A.INDUSTRY_CD , A.TYPE_CD_01_YN , A.TYPE_CD_02_YN , A.TYPE_CD_03_YN , A.TYPE_CD_04_YN , A.TYPE_CD_05_YN , A.TYPE_CD_06_YN , A.TYPE_CD_07_YN , A.TYPE_CD_08_YN , A.TYPE_CD_09_YN , A.TYPE_CD_10_YN , A.TYPE_CD_11_YN , A.INSERT_DT , A.YEAR_CD , A.GRADE_CD , CASE A.GRADE_CD WHEN '01' THEN '휴업' WHEN '02' THEN '영업' WHEN '03' THEN '폐업' END GRADE_CD_NAME , B.NAME INDUSTRY_NAME , ISNULL(C.ANSWER_CNT, 0) ANSER_CNT FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY A RIGHT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_INDUSTRY B ON A.INDUSTRY_CD = B.INDUSTRY_CD RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD, COUNT(*) AS ANSWER_CNT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER WHERE STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY COMPANY_CD ) C ON A.COMPANY_CD = C.COMPANY_CD WHERE A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.YEAR_CD = #year_cd#
AND A.INDUSTRY_CD = $industry_cd$
AND A.COMPANY LIKE '%$company$%'
AND A.CEO_NAME LIKE '%$ceo_name$%'
AND A.ID LIKE '%$id$%'
AND A.GRADE_CD LIKE '$grade_cd$'
) ALL_LIST ) A WHERE A.RNUM > #firstIndex# AND A.RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCheckListByCompany */
SELECT B.TITLE FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY A INNER JOIN ( SELECT AA.MASTER_CD, AA.INDUSTRY_CD, BB.TITLE FROM HETB_CK_LINKED_MASTER AA INNER JOIN HETB_CK_MASTER BB ON AA.MASTER_CD = BB.MASTER_CD ) B ON A.INDUSTRY_CD = B.INDUSTRY_CD WHERE A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.COMPANY_CD = #companyCd#

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCompany */
SELECT A.COMPANY_CD , A.ID , A.PASSWD , A.COMPANY , A.SA_NO , A.CEO_NAME , A.JUMIN , A.PHARMACIST_NO , A.TEL , A.FAX , A.HP , A.POST , A.ADDR1 , A.ADDR2 , A.EMAIL , A.INDUSTRY_CD , A.TYPE_CD_01_YN , A.TYPE_CD_02_YN , A.TYPE_CD_03_YN , A.TYPE_CD_04_YN , A.TYPE_CD_05_YN , A.TYPE_CD_06_YN , A.TYPE_CD_07_YN , A.TYPE_CD_08_YN , A.TYPE_CD_09_YN , A.TYPE_CD_10_YN , A.TYPE_CD_11_YN , A.INSERT_DT , A.INSERT_IP , A.INSERT_ID , A.UPDATE_DT , A.UPDATE_IP , A.UPDATE_ID , A.YEAR_CD , A.BLOG_URL , A.GRADE_CD , B.NAME INDUSTRY_NAME FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY A RIGHT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_INDUSTRY B ON A.INDUSTRY_CD = B.INDUSTRY_CD WHERE A.COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$ AND A.STATUS = 'N'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.isExistCompanyId */
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY WHERE ID LIKE '$id$' AND STATUS = 'N'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectDivideCd */
SELECT DIVIDE_CD FROM HETB_CK_INDUSTRY WHERE INDUSTRY_CD = #industryCd#
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCompanyCd */ SELECT ISNULL(MAX(COMPANY_CD),0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY
sqlMap.insert:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.insertCompany */
INSERT INTO HETB_CK_COMPANY ( COMPANY_CD , ID , PASSWD , COMPANY , SA_NO , CEO_NAME , JUMIN , PHARMACIST_NO , TEL , FAX , HP , POST , ADDR1 , ADDR2 , EMAIL , INDUSTRY_CD , TYPE_CD_01_YN , TYPE_CD_02_YN , TYPE_CD_03_YN , TYPE_CD_04_YN , TYPE_CD_05_YN , TYPE_CD_06_YN , TYPE_CD_07_YN , TYPE_CD_08_YN , TYPE_CD_09_YN , TYPE_CD_10_YN , TYPE_CD_11_YN , GRADE_CD , STATUS , INSERT_DT , INSERT_IP , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_IP , UPDATE_ID , YEAR_CD , BLOG_URL ) VALUES ( /* (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(COMPANY_CD),0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY) */ $company_cd$ , '$id$' , '$passwd$' , '$company$' , '$sa_no$' , '$ceo_name$' , '$jumin$' , '$pharmacist_no$' , '$tel$' , '$fax$' , '$hp$' , '$post$' , '$addr1$' , '$addr2$' , '$email$' , $industry_cd$ , '$type_cd_01_yn$' , '$type_cd_02_yn$' , '$type_cd_03_yn$' , '$type_cd_04_yn$' , '$type_cd_05_yn$' , '$type_cd_06_yn$' , '$type_cd_07_yn$' , '$type_cd_08_yn$' , '$type_cd_09_yn$' , '$type_cd_10_yn$' , '$type_cd_11_yn$' , '02' , 'N' , GETDATE() , '$insert_ip$' , '$insert_id$' , GETDATE() , '$update_ip$' , '$update_id$' , '$year_cd$' , '$blog_url$' )

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.insertMember */
INSERT INTO PRTLTMEMBER ( ID, NAME, PWD, ZIPCODE, ADDR1, ADDR2, EMAIL, TEL, CELL_PHONE, WEBMAIL_FLAG, REG_DATE, JONGNO_NEWS_FLAG, WEBZINE_FLAG, NEWS_FLAG, BIRTHDAY, PWD_HINT, PWD_HINT_ANSWER, SMS_FLAG, PERSONAL_INFO_USE_FLAG, UPDATE_DATE, LAST_LOGIN_DATE, MEMBER_GUBUN, PARENT_NAME, PARENT_TEL, PARENT_EMAIL, PARENT_ID, GROUP_ID, SEX, PINNO, STATUS ) VALUES ( '$id$', '$ceo_name$', '$passwd$', '$post$', '$addr1$', '$addr2$', '$email$', '$tel$', '$hp$', null, GETDATE(), null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, '2' )
sqlMap.update:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.updateCompany */
UPDATE HETB_CK_COMPANY SET PASSWD = '$passwd$' , COMPANY = '$company$' , SA_NO = '$sa_no$' , CEO_NAME = '$ceo_name$' , JUMIN = '$jumin$' , PHARMACIST_NO = '$pharmacist_no$' , TEL = '$tel$' , FAX = '$fax$' , HP = '$hp$' , POST = '$post$' , ADDR1 = '$addr1$' , ADDR2 = '$addr2$' , EMAIL = '$email$' , INDUSTRY_CD = $industry_cd$ , TYPE_CD_01_YN = '$type_cd_01_yn$' , TYPE_CD_02_YN = '$type_cd_02_yn$' , TYPE_CD_03_YN = '$type_cd_03_yn$' , TYPE_CD_04_YN = '$type_cd_04_yn$' , TYPE_CD_05_YN = '$type_cd_05_yn$' , TYPE_CD_06_YN = '$type_cd_06_yn$' , TYPE_CD_07_YN = '$type_cd_07_yn$' , TYPE_CD_08_YN = '$type_cd_08_yn$' , TYPE_CD_09_YN = '$type_cd_09_yn$' , TYPE_CD_10_YN = '$type_cd_10_yn$' , TYPE_CD_11_YN = '$type_cd_11_yn$' , GRADE_CD = #grade_cd# , STATUS = 'N' , UPDATE_DT = GETDATE() , UPDATE_IP = '$update_ip$' , UPDATE_ID = '$update_id$' , YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' , BLOG_URL = '$blog_url$' WHERE COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.updateMember */
UPDATE PRTLTMEMBER SET PWD = '$passwd$', ZIPCODE = '$post$', ADDR1 = '$addr1$', ADDR2 = '$addr2$', TEL = '$tel$', CELL_PHONE = '$hp$', EMAIL = '$email$', UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ID = '$id$'
sqlMap.delete:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.deleteCompanyForExcel */
DELETE FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY WHERE YEAR_CD = #yearCd# AND INDUSTRY_CD = #industryCd#
sqlMap.update:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.deleteHandleItem */
DELETE FROM HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM WHERE COMPANY_ID = '$id$' AND YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$'
sqlMap.select:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCheckformList */ SELECT A.MASTER_CD , A.TYPE_CD , A.TITLE , A.ATTACHFILE1 , A.START_DT , A.END_DT , A.INSERT_DT , A.QUESTION_CNT , A.TYPE_TOT_CNT , A.ANSWER_CNT , (A.TYPE_TOT_CNT - A.ANSWER_CNT) NOANSWER_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.MASTER_CD , A.TYPE_CD , A.TITLE , A.ATTACHFILE1 , A.START_DT , A.END_DT , A.INSERT_DT , ISNULL(B.QUESTION_CNT, 0) QUESTION_CNT , ISNULL(C.ANSWER_CNT, 0) ANSWER_CNT , ISNULL(D.TYPE_CNT, 0) TYPE_TOT_CNT FROM HETB_CK_MASTER A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MASTER_CD, COUNT(*) QUESTION_CNT FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY MASTER_CD ) B ON A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MASTER_CD, COUNT(*) ANSWER_CNT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER WHERE STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY MASTER_CD ) C ON A.MASTER_CD = C.MASTER_CD RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( /* 해당분류별 응모대상자 총수 */ SELECT A.MASTER_CD, COUNT(*) TYPE_CNT FROM HETB_CK_MASTER A INNER JOIN HETB_CK_LINKED_MASTER C ON A.MASTER_CD = C.MASTER_CD INNER JOIN HETB_CK_COMPANY B ON B.INDUSTRY_CD = C.INDUSTRY_CD WHERE A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' GROUP BY A.MASTER_CD ) D ON A.MASTER_CD = D.MASTER_CD WHERE A.YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$'
) A ORDER BY TYPE_CD ASC

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCheckform */
SELECT MASTER_CD , TYPE_CD , TITLE , START_DT , END_DT , ATTACHFILE1 , ATTACHFILEORG1 , ATTACHTYPE1 , INSERT_DT , INSERT_IP , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_IP , UPDATE_ID , CONTENTS , YEAR_CD , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE MASTER_CD=$master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' ) QUESTION_CNT , CASE WHEN (CONVERT(CHAR(10), START_DT, 120) > CONVERT(CHAR(10), GETDATE(), 120)) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END GIGAN_OPEN_YN FROM HETB_CK_MASTER WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N'
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectMasterCd */ SELECT ISNULL(MAX(MASTER_CD), 0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_MASTER
sqlMap.insert:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.insertCheckform */
INSERT INTO HETB_CK_MASTER ( MASTER_CD , TYPE_CD , TITLE , START_DT , END_DT , ATTACHFILE1 , INSERT_DT , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_ID , CONTENTS , STATUS , YEAR_CD ) VALUES ( $master_cd$ , '$type_cd$' , '$title$' , #start_dt# , #end_dt# , '$attachfile1$' , GETDATE() , '$insert_id$' , GETDATE() , '$update_id$' , '$contents$' , 'N' , '$year_cd$' )
sqlMap.update:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.updateCheckform */
UPDATE HETB_CK_MASTER SET TYPE_CD = '$type_cd$' , TITLE = '$title$' , START_DT = #start_dt# , END_DT = #end_dt#
, ATTACHFILE1 = '$attachfile1$' , ATTACHFILEORG1 = '$attachfileorg1$' , ATTACHTYPE1 = '$attachtype1$'
, UPDATE_DT = GETDATE() , UPDATE_IP = '$update_ip$' , UPDATE_ID = '$update_id$' , CONTENTS = '$contents$' , YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.deleteCheckformAttachFile */
UPDATE HETB_CK_MASTER SET ATTACHFILE1 = '' , UPDATE_DT = GETDATE() , UPDATE_ID = '$update_id$' WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.deleteCheckform */
UPDATE HETB_CK_MASTER SET STATUS = 'Y' , UPDATE_DT = GETDATE() , UPDATE_ID = '$update_id$' WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$
sqlMap.select:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCheckedCompanyListTotCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.COMPANY_CD , B.COMPANY , B.INDUSTRY_CD , ISNULL(C.NAME, ' ') INDUSTRY_NAME , B.CEO_NAME , B.TEL , A.INSERT_DT , C.DIVIDE_CD FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER A , HETB_CK_COMPANY B RIGHT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_INDUSTRY C ON B.INDUSTRY_CD = C.INDUSTRY_CD WHERE A.MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.COMPANY_CD = B.COMPANY_CD ORDER BY A.INSERT_DT DESC ) A

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectNotCheckedCompanyListTotCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.MASTER_CD , B.COMPANY_CD , B.ID , B.COMPANY , B.SA_NO , B.CEO_NAME , B.HP , B.TEL , B.INDUSTRY_CD FROM HETB_CK_LINKED_MASTER A , HETB_CK_COMPANY B WHERE A.MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND B.STATUS = 'N' AND A.INDUSTRY_CD = B.INDUSTRY_CD ) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MASTER_CD , COMPANY_CD FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' ) B ON A.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD AND A.COMPANY_CD = B.COMPANY_CD AND B.MASTER_CD IS NULL RIGHT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_INDUSTRY C ON A.INDUSTRY_CD = C.INDUSTRY_CD

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectNotCheckedCompanyList */
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.MASTER_CD) RNUM , A.MASTER_CD , A.COMPANY_CD , A.ID , A.COMPANY , A.SA_NO , A.CEO_NAME , A.HP , A.TEL , A.INDUSTRY_CD , ISNULL(C.NAME, ' ') INDUSTRY_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.MASTER_CD , B.COMPANY_CD , B.ID , B.COMPANY , B.SA_NO , B.CEO_NAME , B.HP , B.TEL , B.INDUSTRY_CD FROM HETB_CK_LINKED_MASTER A , HETB_CK_COMPANY B WHERE A.MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND B.STATUS = 'N' AND A.INDUSTRY_CD = B.INDUSTRY_CD ) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MASTER_CD , COMPANY_CD FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' ) B ON A.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD AND A.COMPANY_CD = B.COMPANY_CD AND B.MASTER_CD IS NULL RIGHT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_INDUSTRY C ON A.INDUSTRY_CD = C.INDUSTRY_CD ) A WHERE A.RNUM > #firstIndex# AND A.RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectQuestionList */
SELECT QUESTION_CD AS QUESTION_CD , QUESTION AS QUESTION , QUEST_TYPE_CD AS QUEST_TYPE_CD , MULTI_CHECK_YN AS MULTI_CHECK_YN , OTHER_YN AS OTHER_YN FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY ORDERBY ASC

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectAnswerStatisticsList */
SELECT A.QUESTION2_CD AS QUESTION2_CD , A.QUESTION2 AS QUESTION2 , ISNULL(B.TC, 0) AS TC , ISNULL(B.TOT, 0) AS TOT , ISNULL(B.PERCENT, 0) AS PERCENT , ISNULL(B.PERCENT, 0)*2 AS BAR_WIDTH , A.VALIDATION FROM ( SELECT MASTER_CD , QUESTION1_CD , QUESTION2_CD , QUESTION2 , VALIDATION FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION2 WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND QUESTION1_CD = $question_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT MASTER_CD , QUESTION_CD , 0 QUESTION2_CD , '기타' QUESTION2 , 'N' AS VALIDATION FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND QUESTION_CD = $question_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' AND OTHER_YN = 'Y' ) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.MASTER_CD , A.QUESTION_CD , A.QUESTION2_CD , A.TC , B.TOT , ROUND(A.TC*100/B.TOT) PERCENT FROM ( SELECT MASTER_CD , QUESTION_CD , QUESTION2_CD , COUNT(*) TC FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND QUESTION_CD = $question_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY MASTER_CD, QUESTION_CD, QUESTION2_CD ) A , ( SELECT MASTER_CD , QUESTION_CD , COUNT(*) TOT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND QUESTION_CD = $question_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY MASTER_CD, QUESTION_CD ) B WHERE A.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD AND A.QUESTION_CD = B.QUESTION_CD ) B ON A.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD AND A.QUESTION1_CD = B.QUESTION_CD AND A.QUESTION2_CD = B.QUESTION2_CD ORDER BY CASE QUESTION2_CD WHEN 0 THEN 999999999999999999 ELSE QUESTION2_CD END ASC

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.downloadExcelAnswerList */
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AB.SANGHO_NAME) RNUM , AB.SANGHO_NAME , AB.NAME1 , ISNULL(AB.TEL,' ') TEL , QA.QUESTION , AA.QUESTION2_CD , CASE AA.QUESTION2_CD WHEN 0 THEN '기타' ELSE QB.ORDERBY END ITEM_NO /* 보기번호 */ , CASE AA.QUESTION2_CD WHEN 0 THEN AA.OTHER ELSE QB.QUESTION2 END ITEM_CONTENTS /* 보기 */ , CONVERT(CHAR(20), AA.INSERT_DT, 120) ANSWER_DATE FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 AA , HETB_CK_QUESTION QA RIGHT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION2 QB ON AA.QUESTION2_CD = QB.QUESTION2_CD , HETB_CK_ANSWER AB WHERE AA.MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND QA.MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND AA.QUESTION_CD = $question_cd$ AND QA.QUESTION_CD = $question_cd$ AND AA.COMPANY_CD = AB.COMPANY_CD AND AB.MASTER_CD = $master_cd$

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectQuestion */
SELECT QUESTION_CD , MASTER_CD , QUESTION , QUEST_TYPE_CD , MULTI_CHECK_YN , OTHER_YN , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_ID FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE QUESTION_CD = $question_cd$ AND MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N'
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectQuestionCd */ SELECT ISNULL(MAX(QUESTION_CD), 0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectOrderby */ SELECT ISNULL(MAX(ORDERBY), 0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$
sqlMap.insert:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.insertQuestion */
INSERT INTO HETB_CK_QUESTION (QUESTION_CD , MASTER_CD , QUESTION , QUEST_TYPE_CD , MULTI_CHECK_YN , OTHER_YN , ORDERBY , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_ID , INSERT_DT , UPDATE_DT) VALUES ( $question_cd$ , $master_cd$ , '$question$' , '$quest_type_cd$' , '$multi_check_yn$' , '$other_yn$' , $orderby$ , '$insert_id$' , '$update_id$' , GETDATE() , GETDATE())
sqlMap.update:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.updateQuestion */
UPDATE HETB_CK_QUESTION SET QUESTION = '$question$' , QUEST_TYPE_CD = '$quest_type_cd$' , MULTI_CHECK_YN = '$multi_check_yn$' , OTHER_YN = '$other_yn$' , UPDATE_ID = '$update_id$' , UPDATE_DT = GETDATE() WHERE QUESTION_CD = $question_cd$ AND MASTER_CD = $master_cd$

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.updateQuestionForDelete */
UPDATE HETB_CK_QUESTION SET STATUS = 'Y' , UPDATE_DT = GETDATE() , UPDATE_ID = '$update_id$' WHERE QUESTION_CD = $question_cd$ AND MASTER_CD = $master_cd$
sqlMap.select:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectQuestion2ForUpdate */
/* 의약업소 자율점검 (점검표관리) (질문 항목 HETB_CK_QUESTION2) : 조회 (복수 레코드) */ SELECT QUESTION2_CD , QUESTION2 , ORDERBY , UPDATE_DT , STATUS , VALIDATION FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION2 WHERE QUESTION1_CD = $question1_cd$ AND MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY ORDERBY ASC
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectQuestion2Cd */ SELECT ISNULL(MAX(QUESTION2_CD), 0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION2
sqlMap.insert:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.insertQuestion2 */
/* 질문 항목 등록 */ INSERT INTO HETB_CK_QUESTION2 (QUESTION2_CD , MASTER_CD , QUESTION1_CD , QUESTION2 , ORDERBY , VALIDATION) VALUES ( $question2_cd$ , $master_cd$ , $question1_cd$ , '$question2$' , $orderby$ , #validation#)
sqlMap.select:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCheckedHandleitemListTotCnt */
SELECT count(HANDLE_CD) FROM HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM WHERE COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$ AND YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCheckedHandleitemList */
SELECT HANDLE_CD , ITEM_NAME , UNIT , FIELD1 , FIELD2 , FIELD3 , FIELD4 , YEAR_CD , COMPANY_CD , COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_NAME , STATUS FROM HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM WHERE COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$ AND YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectCheckedQuestionCntList */
SELECT CC.ID , CC.COMPANY , ISNULL(BB.TOT_QUESTION_CNT,0) AS TOT_QUESTION_CNT , ISNULL(AA.CORRECT_QUESTION_CNT,0) AS CORRECT_QUESTION_CNT , ISNULL(DD.WRONG_QUESTION_CNT,0) AS WRONG_QUESTION_CNT FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY CC LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.COMPANY_ID, COUNT(C.QUESTION_CD) AS CORRECT_QUESTION_CNT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 A INNER JOIN HETB_CK_MASTER E ON E.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD AND E.TYPE_CD = '01' INNER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION2 B ON B.QUESTION2_CD = A.QUESTION2_CD AND B.QUESTION1_CD = A.QUESTION_CD AND B.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD INNER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION C ON C.QUESTION_CD = A.QUESTION_CD AND C.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD WHERE ISNULL(B.VALIDATION,'N') = 'Y' GROUP BY A.COMPANY_ID ) AA ON AA.COMPANY_ID = CC.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.COMPANY_ID, COUNT(C.QUESTION_CD) AS WRONG_QUESTION_CNT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 A INNER JOIN HETB_CK_MASTER E ON E.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD AND E.TYPE_CD = '01' INNER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION2 B ON B.QUESTION2_CD = A.QUESTION2_CD AND B.QUESTION1_CD = A.QUESTION_CD AND B.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD INNER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION C ON C.QUESTION_CD = A.QUESTION_CD AND C.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD WHERE ISNULL(B.VALIDATION,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY A.COMPANY_ID ) DD ON DD.COMPANY_ID = CC.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.COMPANY_ID, COUNT(C.QUESTION_CD) AS TOT_QUESTION_CNT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 A INNER JOIN HETB_CK_MASTER E ON E.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD AND E.TYPE_CD = '01' INNER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION C ON C.QUESTION_CD = A.QUESTION_CD AND C.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD GROUP BY A.COMPANY_ID ) BB ON BB.COMPANY_ID = CC.ID

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectWrongQuestionList */
SELECT A.COMPANY_ID, C.QUESTION, C.ORDERBY FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 A INNER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION2 B ON B.QUESTION2_CD = A.QUESTION2_CD AND B.QUESTION1_CD = A.QUESTION_CD AND B.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD INNER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION C ON C.QUESTION_CD = A.QUESTION_CD AND C.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD INNER JOIN HETB_CK_MASTER D ON D.TYPE_CD = '01' AND D.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD WHERE A.MASTER_CD = 2 AND ISNULL(B.VALIDATION,'N') = 'N'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectLinkedMasterList */
SELECT A.MASTER_CD, A.INDUSTRY_CD, A.USE_YN, CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.REG_DATE, 120) AS REG_DATE, B.NAME, '[' + SUBSTRING(C.YEAR_CD,0,4) + ']' + C.TITLE AS TITLE FROM HETB_CK_LINKED_MASTER A INNER JOIN HETB_CK_INDUSTRY B ON A.INDUSTRY_CD = B.INDUSTRY_CD INNER JOIN HETB_CK_MASTER C ON A.MASTER_CD = C.MASTER_CD ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectIndustryAttrList */
SELECT A.INDUSTRY_CD, A.DIVIDE_CD, A.NAME, A.USE_YN FROM HETB_CK_INDUSTRY A WHERE A.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY A.INDUSTRY_CD DESC

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectLinkedMasterByIndustry */
SELECT A.MASTER_CD ,'[' + SUBSTRING(A.YEAR_CD,0,4) + ']' + A.TITLE AS TITLE FROM HETB_CK_MASTER A WHERE MASTER_CD NOT IN ( SELECT MASTER_CD FROM HETB_CK_LINKED_MASTER WHERE INDUSTRY_CD = #industryCd# ) AND YEAR_CD NOT IN ('000000') ORDER BY A.MASTER_CD DESC

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectMasterListByIndustry */
SELECT A.MASTER_CD ,A.TITLE FROM HETB_CK_MASTER A WHERE MASTER_CD IN ( SELECT MASTER_CD FROM HETB_CK_LINKED_MASTER WHERE INDUSTRY_CD = #industryCd# ) AND YEAR_CD NOT IN ('000000') ORDER BY A.MASTER_CD DESC

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectMasterCompanyPointList */
SELECT A.COMPANY, ISNULL(B.QUESTION_CNT,0) AS QUESTION_CNT, ISNULL(C.CORRECT_ANSWER_CNT,0) AS CORRECT_ANSWER_CNT, ISNULL(D.WRONG_ANSWER_CNT,0) AS WRONG_ANSWER_CNT, A.MASTER_CD, A.COMPANY_CD, A.DIVIDE_CD FROM ( SELECT A1.ID, A1.COMPANY, A1.INDUSTRY_CD, A3.MASTER_CD, A1.CEO_NAME, A1.GRADE_CD, A1.COMPANY_CD, A2.DIVIDE_CD FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY A1 INNER JOIN HETB_CK_INDUSTRY A2 ON A2.INDUSTRY_CD = A1.INDUSTRY_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_LINKED_MASTER A3 ON A3.INDUSTRY_CD = A1.INDUSTRY_CD WHERE A1.INDUSTRY_CD = #industryCd# ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT C1.MASTER_CD, C1.COMPANY_ID, COUNT(*) AS CORRECT_ANSWER_CNT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 C1 INNER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION2 C2 ON C1.MASTER_CD = C2.MASTER_CD AND C1.QUESTION_CD = C2.QUESTION1_CD AND C1.QUESTION2_CD = C2.QUESTION2_CD INNER JOIN ( SELECT MASTER_CD FROM HETB_CK_MASTER WHERE YEAR_CD = #yearCd# ) C3 ON C3.MASTER_CD = C1.MASTER_CD WHERE C2.VALIDATION = 'Y' AND C1.STATUS = 'N' AND C2.STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY C1.MASTER_CD, C1.COMPANY_ID ) C ON C.COMPANY_ID = A.ID AND C.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT MASTER_CD, COUNT(*) AS QUESTION_CNT FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY MASTER_CD ) B ON B.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT C1.MASTER_CD, C1.COMPANY_ID, COUNT(*) AS WRONG_ANSWER_CNT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 C1 INNER JOIN HETB_CK_QUESTION2 C2 ON C1.MASTER_CD = C2.MASTER_CD AND C1.QUESTION_CD = C2.QUESTION1_CD AND C1.QUESTION2_CD = C2.QUESTION2_CD WHERE C2.VALIDATION = 'N' AND C1.STATUS = 'N' AND C2.STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY C1.MASTER_CD, C1.COMPANY_ID ) D ON D.COMPANY_ID = A.ID AND D.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD WHERE 1=1
A.MASTER_CD = #masterCd#
A.GRADE_CD = #gradeCd#
A.COMPANY LIKE '%' + #searchTxt# + '%'
A.ID LIKE '%' + #searchTxt# + '%'
A.CEO_NAME LIKE '%' + #searchTxt# + '%'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectMasterListForItem */
SELECT A.MASTER_CD, A.TITLE FROM HETB_CK_MASTER A WHERE SUBSTRING(YEAR_CD,1,4) = #yearCd# AND TYPE_CD = '02'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectItemList */
SELECT A.ITEM_ID, A.ITEM_NAME, A.MASTER_CD, A.EXCEPT_NUM, CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.REG_DATE, 120) AS REG_DATE, A.YEAR_CD, B.TITLE FROM HETB_CK_ITEM A INNER JOIN HETB_CK_MASTER B ON B.MASTER_CD = A.MASTER_CD WHERE A.YEAR_CD = #yearCd#
sqlMap.insert:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.addCompanyForMigration */ INSERT INTO HETB_CK_COMPANY ( COMPANY_CD , ID , PASSWD , COMPANY , SA_NO , CEO_NAME , JUMIN , PHARMACIST_NO , TEL , FAX , HP , POST , ADDR1 , ADDR2 , EMAIL , INDUSTRY_CD , TYPE_CD_01_YN , TYPE_CD_02_YN , TYPE_CD_03_YN , TYPE_CD_04_YN , TYPE_CD_05_YN , TYPE_CD_06_YN , TYPE_CD_07_YN , TYPE_CD_08_YN , TYPE_CD_09_YN , TYPE_CD_10_YN , TYPE_CD_11_YN , GRADE_CD , STATUS , INSERT_DT , INSERT_IP , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_IP , UPDATE_ID , YEAR_CD , BLOG_URL ) SELECT
$companyCd$ , ID , PASSWD , COMPANY , SA_NO , CEO_NAME , JUMIN , PHARMACIST_NO , TEL , FAX , HP , POST , ADDR1 , ADDR2 , EMAIL , INDUSTRY_CD , TYPE_CD_01_YN , TYPE_CD_02_YN , TYPE_CD_03_YN , TYPE_CD_04_YN , TYPE_CD_05_YN , TYPE_CD_06_YN , TYPE_CD_07_YN , TYPE_CD_08_YN , TYPE_CD_09_YN , TYPE_CD_10_YN , TYPE_CD_11_YN , GRADE_CD , STATUS , GETDATE() , INSERT_IP , INSERT_ID , GETDATE() , UPDATE_IP , UPDATE_ID , #toYearCd# , BLOG_URL FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY WHERE YEAR_CD = #fromYearCd# AND STATUS = 'N'
sqlMap.select:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectAFMasterCdForMigration */
SELECT MASTER_CD FROM HETB_CK_MASTER WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND YEAR_CD = #toYearCd#

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectMasterCdForMigration */
SELECT MASTER_CD FROM HETB_CK_MASTER WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND YEAR_CD = #fromYearCd#

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.selectQuestionCdForMigration */
SELECT QUESTION_CD FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND MASTER_CD = #fromMasterCd#
sqlMap.update:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.deleteMasterForMigration */
UPDATE HETB_CK_MASTER SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE YEAR_CD = #toYearCd#

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.deleteQuestionForMigration */
UPDATE HETB_CK_QUESTION SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MASTER_CD = #toMasterCd#

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.deleteQuestion2ForMigration */
UPDATE HETB_CK_QUESTION2 SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MASTER_CD = #toMasterCd#
sqlMap.insert:
/* FreecheckAdminDAO.addMasterForMigration */
INSERT INTO HETB_CK_MASTER ( MASTER_CD , TYPE_CD , TITLE , START_DT , END_DT , ATTACHFILE1 , INSERT_DT , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_ID , CONTENTS , STATUS , YEAR_CD ) SELECT /*(SELECT ISNULL(MAX(MASTER_CD), 0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_MASTER) */ #toMasterCd# , TYPE_CD , TITLE , START_DT , END_DT , ATTACHFILE1 , GETDATE() , INSERT_ID , GETDATE() , UPDATE_ID , CONTENTS , STATUS , #toYearCd# FROM HETB_CK_MASTER WHERE YEAR_CD = #fromYearCd# AND MASTER_CD = #fromMasterCd# AND STATUS = 'N'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.addQuestionForMigration */
INSERT INTO HETB_CK_QUESTION (QUESTION_CD , MASTER_CD , QUESTION , QUEST_TYPE_CD , MULTI_CHECK_YN , OTHER_YN , ORDERBY , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_ID , INSERT_DT , UPDATE_DT) SELECT /* (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(QUESTION_CD),0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION */ #toQuestionCd# , #toMasterCd# , QUESTION , QUEST_TYPE_CD , MULTI_CHECK_YN , OTHER_YN , ORDERBY , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_ID , GETDATE() , GETDATE() FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE MASTER_CD = #fromMasterCd# AND QUESTION_CD = #fromQuestionCd# AND STATUS = 'N'

/* FreecheckAdminDAO.addQuestion2ForMigration */
INSERT INTO HETB_CK_QUESTION2 (QUESTION2_CD , MASTER_CD , QUESTION1_CD , QUESTION2 , ORDERBY , VALIDATION) SELECT /* (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(QUESTION_CD),0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION */ $question2Cd$ , #toMasterCd# , #toQuestionCd# , QUESTION2 , ORDERBY , VALIDATION FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION2 WHERE MASTER_CD = #fromMasterCd# AND QUESTION1_CD = #fromQuestionCd# AND STATUS = 'N'
